◆ add_connector()

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::add_connector ( CutConnectors &  connectors,
const Vec2d &  mouse_position 
)
protected
2841{
2842 if (!m_connectors_editing)
2843 return false;
2844
2845 Vec3d pos;
2846 Vec3d pos_world;
2847 if (unproject_on_cut_plane(mouse_position.cast<double>(), pos, pos_world)) {
2848 Plater::TakeSnapshot snapshot(wxGetApp().plater(), _L("Add connector"), UndoRedo::SnapshotType::GizmoAction);
2849 unselect_all_connectors();
2850
2851 connectors.emplace_back(pos, m_rotation_m,
2852 m_connector_size * 0.5f, m_connector_depth_ratio,
2853 m_connector_size_tolerance * 0.5f, m_connector_depth_ratio_tolerance,
2854 CutConnectorAttributes( CutConnectorType(m_connector_type),
2855 CutConnectorStyle(m_connector_style),
2856 CutConnectorShape(m_connector_shape_id)));
2857 m_selected.push_back(true);
2858 m_selected_count = 1;
2859 assert(m_selected.size() == connectors.size());
2860 update_raycasters_for_picking();
2861 m_parent.set_as_dirty();
2862 check_and_update_connectors_state();
2863
2864 return true;
2865 }
2866 return false;
2867}

1682{
1683 static float last_y = 0.0f;

1685

1687 y = std::min(y, bottom_limit - win_h);
1688
1689 ImGui::SetWindowPos(ImVec2(x, y), ImGuiCond_Always);

◆ apply_connectors_in_model()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::apply_connectors_in_model ( ModelObject *  mo,
int &  dowels_count 
)
private
2428{
2429 if (m_connector_mode == CutConnectorMode::Manual) {
2430 clear_selection();
2431
2432 for (CutConnector&connector : mo->cut_connectors) {
2433 connector.rotation_m = m_rotation_m;
2434
2435 if (connector.attribs.type == CutConnectorType::Dowel) {
2436 if (connector.attribs.style == CutConnectorStyle::Prism)
2437 connector.height *= 2;
2438 dowels_count ++;
2439 }
2440 else {
2441 // calculate shift of the connector center regarding to the position on the cut plane
2442 connector.pos += m_cut_normal * 0.5 * double(connector.height);
2443 }
2444 }
2445 mo->apply_cut_connectors(_u8L("Connector"));
2446 }
2447}

◆ bounding_box()

BoundingBoxf3 Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::bounding_box ( ) const
1240{
1241 BoundingBoxf3 ret;
1242 const Selection& selection = m_parent.get_selection();
1243 const Selection::IndicesList& idxs = selection.get_volume_idxs();
1244 for (unsigned int i : idxs) {
1245 const GLVolume* volume = selection.get_volume(i);
1246 // respect just to the solid parts for FFF and ignore pad and supports for SLA
1247 if (!volume->is_modifier && !volume->is_sla_pad() && !volume->is_sla_support())
1248 ret.merge(volume->transformed_convex_hull_bounding_box());
1249 }
1250 return ret;
1251}

◆ check_and_update_connectors_state()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::check_and_update_connectors_state ( )
private
2315{
2316 m_info_stats.invalidate();
2317 m_invalid_connectors_idxs.clear();
2318 const ModelObject* mo = m_c->selection_info()->model_object();
2319 auto inst_id = m_c->selection_info()->get_active_instance();
2320 if (inst_id < 0)
2321 return;
2322 const CutConnectors& connectors = mo->cut_connectors;
2323 const ModelInstance* mi = mo->instances[inst_id];
2324 const Vec3d& instance_offset = mi->get_offset();
2325 const double sla_shift = double(m_c->selection_info()->get_sla_shift());
2326
2327 for (size_t i = 0; i < connectors.size(); ++i) {
2328 const CutConnector& connector = connectors[i];
2329 Vec3d pos = connector.pos + instance_offset + sla_shift * Vec3d::UnitZ(); // recalculate connector position to world position
2330 if (is_conflict_for_connector(i, connectors, pos))
2331 m_invalid_connectors_idxs.emplace_back(i);
2332 }
2333}

◆ delete_selected_connectors()

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::delete_selected_connectors ( CutConnectors &  connectors)
protected
2870{
2871 if (connectors.empty())
2872 return false;
2873
2874 Plater::TakeSnapshot snapshot(wxGetApp().plater(), _L("Delete connector"), UndoRedo::SnapshotType::GizmoAction);
2875
2876 // remove connectors
2877 for (int i = int(connectors.size()) - 1; i >= 0; i--)
2878 if (m_selected[i])
2879 connectors.erase(connectors.begin() + i);
2880 // remove selections
2881 m_selected.erase(std::remove_if(m_selected.begin(), m_selected.end(), [](const auto& selected) {
2882 return selected; }), m_selected.end());
2883 m_selected_count = 0;
2884
2885 assert(m_selected.size() == connectors.size());
2886 update_raycasters_for_picking();
2887 m_parent.set_as_dirty();
2888 check_and_update_connectors_state();
2889 return true;
2890}

◆ do_stop_dragging()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase::do_stop_dragging ( bool  perform_mouse_cleanup)
protectedinherited
279{
280 for (auto& grabber : m_grabbers) grabber.dragging = false;
281 m_dragging = false;
282
283 // NOTE: This should be part of GLCanvas3D
284 // Reset hover_id when leave window
285 if (perform_mouse_cleanup) m_parent.mouse_up_cleanup();
286
287 on_stop_dragging();
288
289 // There is prediction that after draggign, data are changed
290 // Data are updated twice also by canvas3D::reload_scene.
291 // Should be fixed.
292 m_parent.get_gizmos_manager().update_data();
293
294 wxGetApp().obj_manipul()->set_dirty();
295
296 // Let the plater know that the dragging finished, so a delayed
297 // refresh of the scene with the background processing data should
298 // be performed.
299 m_parent.post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_MOUSE_DRAGGING_FINISHED));
300 // updates camera target constraints
301 m_parent.refresh_camera_scene_box();
302}

◆ dragging_grabber_xy()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::dragging_grabber_xy ( const GLGizmoBase::UpdateData &  data)
protected
1110{
1111 const Vec2d mouse_pos = to_2d(mouse_position_in_local_plane((GrabberID)m_hover_id, data.mouse_ray));
1112
1113 const Vec2d orig_dir = Vec2d::UnitX();
1114 const Vec2d new_dir = mouse_pos.normalized();
1115
1116 const double two_pi = 2.0 * PI;
1117
1118 double theta = ::acos(std::clamp(new_dir.dot(orig_dir), -1.0, 1.0));
1119 if (cross2(orig_dir, new_dir) < 0.0)
1120 theta = two_pi - theta;
1121
1122 const double len = mouse_pos.norm();
1123 // snap to coarse snap region
1124 if (m_snap_coarse_in_radius <= len && len <= m_snap_coarse_out_radius) {
1125 const double step = two_pi / double(SnapRegionsCount);
1126 theta = step * std::round(theta / step);
1127 }
1128 // snap to fine snap region (scale)
1129 else if (m_snap_fine_in_radius <= len && len <= m_snap_fine_out_radius) {
1130 const double step = two_pi / double(ScaleStepsCount);
1131 theta = step * std::round(theta / step);
1132 }
1133
1134 if (is_approx(theta, two_pi))
1135 theta = 0.0;
1136 if (m_hover_id == X)
1137 theta += 0.5 * PI;
1138
1139 if (!is_approx(theta, 0.0))
1140 reset_cut_by_contours();
1141
1142 Vec3d rotation = Vec3d::Zero();
1143 rotation[m_hover_id] = theta;
1144
1145 const Transform3d rotation_tmp = m_start_dragging_m * rotation_transform(rotation);
1146 const bool update_tbb = !m_rotation_m.rotation().isApprox(rotation_tmp.rotation());
1147 m_rotation_m = rotation_tmp;
1148 if (update_tbb)
1149 m_transformed_bounding_box = transformed_bounding_box(m_plane_center, m_rotation_m);
1150
1151 m_angle = theta;
1152 while (m_angle > two_pi)
1153 m_angle -= two_pi;
1154 if (m_angle < 0.0)
1155 m_angle += two_pi;
1156
1157 update_clipper();
1158}

◆ dragging_grabber_z()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::dragging_grabber_z ( const GLGizmoBase::UpdateData &  data)
protected
1076{
1077 const Vec3d grabber_init_pos = (m_hover_id == CutPlane ? 0. : m_grabber_connection_len) * Vec3d::UnitZ();
1078 const Vec3d starting_drag_position = translation_transform(m_plane_center) * m_rotation_m * grabber_init_pos;
1079 double projection = 0.0;
1080
1081 Vec3d starting_vec = m_rotation_m * Vec3d::UnitZ();
1082 if (starting_vec.norm() != 0.0) {
1083 const Vec3d mouse_dir = data.mouse_ray.unit_vector();
1084 // finds the intersection of the mouse ray with the plane parallel to the camera viewport and passing throught the starting position
1085 // use ray-plane intersection see i.e. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Line%E2%80%93plane_intersection algebric form
1086 // in our case plane normal and ray direction are the same (orthogonal view)
1087 // when moving to perspective camera the negative z unit axis of the camera needs to be transformed in world space and used as plane normal
1088 const Vec3d inters = data.mouse_ray.a + (starting_drag_position - data.mouse_ray.a).dot(mouse_dir) * mouse_dir;
1089 // vector from the starting position to the found intersection
1090 const Vec3d inters_vec = inters - starting_drag_position;
1091
1092 starting_vec.normalize();
1093 // finds projection of the vector along the staring direction
1094 projection = inters_vec.dot(starting_vec);
1095 }
1096 if (wxGetKeyState(WXK_SHIFT))
1097 projection = m_snap_step * std::round(projection / m_snap_step);
1098
1099 const Vec3d shift = starting_vec * projection;
1100 if (shift != Vec3d::Zero())
1101 reset_cut_by_contours();
1102
1103 // move cut plane center
1104 set_center(m_plane_center + shift, true);
1105
1106 m_was_cut_plane_dragged = true;
1107}

double m_grabber_connection_len
Definition GLGizmoCut.hpp:56

Definition GLGizmoCut.hpp:36
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::m_was_cut_plane_dragged
bool m_was_cut_plane_dragged
Definition GLGizmoCut.hpp:139

void set_center(const Vec3d &center, bool update_tbb=false)
Definition GLGizmoCut.cpp:462

◆ get_cut_matrix()

Transform3d Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::get_cut_matrix ( const Selection &  selection)
protected
2450{
2451 const int instance_idx = selection.get_instance_idx();
2452 const int object_idx = selection.get_object_idx();
2453 ModelObject* mo = selection.get_model()->objects[object_idx];
2454 if (!mo)
2455 return Transform3d::Identity();
2456
2457 // m_cut_z is the distance from the bed. Subtract possible SLA elevation.
2458 const double sla_shift_z = selection.get_first_volume()->get_sla_shift_z();
2459
2460 const Vec3d instance_offset = mo->instances[instance_idx]->get_offset();
2461 Vec3d cut_center_offset = m_plane_center - instance_offset;
2462 cut_center_offset[Z] -= sla_shift_z;
2463
2464 return translation_transform(cut_center_offset) * m_rotation_m;
2465}

◆ get_tooltip()

std::string Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::get_tooltip ( ) const
overridevirtual

Mouse tooltip text.

Returns
Text to be visible in mouse tooltip

Reimplemented from Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase.

231{
232 std::string tooltip;
233 if (m_hover_id == Z || (m_dragging && m_hover_id == CutPlane)) {
234 double koef = m_imperial_units ? ObjectManipulation::mm_to_in : 1.0;
235 std::string unit_str = " " + (m_imperial_units ? _u8L("in") : _u8L("mm"));
236 const BoundingBoxf3& tbb = m_transformed_bounding_box;
237
238 const std::string name = m_keep_as_parts ? _u8L("Part") : _u8L("Object");
239 if (tbb.max.z() >= 0.0) {
240 double top = (tbb.min.z() <= 0.0 ? tbb.max.z() : tbb.size().z()) * koef;
241 tooltip += format(static_cast<float>(top), 2) + " " + unit_str + " (" + name + " A)";
242 if (tbb.min.z() <= 0.0)
243 tooltip += "\n";
244 }
245 if (tbb.min.z() <= 0.0) {
246 double bottom = (tbb.max.z() <= 0.0 ? tbb.size().z() : (tbb.min.z() * (-1))) * koef;
247 tooltip += format(static_cast<float>(bottom), 2) + " " + unit_str + " (" + name + " B)";
248 }
249 return tooltip;
250 }
251
252 if (!m_dragging && m_hover_id == CutPlane)
253 return _u8L("Click to flip the cut plane\n"
254 "Drag to move the cut plane\n"
255 "Right-click a part to assign it to the other side");
256
257 if (tooltip.empty() && (m_hover_id == X || m_hover_id == Y)) {
258 std::string axis = m_hover_id == X ? "X" : "Y";
259 return axis + ": " + format(float(rad2deg(m_angle)), 1) + _u8L("°");
260 }
261
262 return tooltip;
263}

◆ gizmo_event()

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::gizmo_event ( SLAGizmoEventType  action,
const Vec2d &  mouse_position,
bool  shift_down,
bool  alt_down,
bool  control_down 
)
2940{
2941 if (is_dragging() || m_connector_mode == CutConnectorMode::Auto)
2942 return false;
2943
2944 if ( (m_hover_id < 0 || m_hover_id == CutPlane) && shift_down && ! m_connectors_editing &&
2945 (action == SLAGizmoEventType::LeftDown || action == SLAGizmoEventType::LeftUp || action == SLAGizmoEventType::Moving) )
2946 return process_cut_line(action, mouse_position);
2947
2948 if (!m_keep_upper || !m_keep_lower)
2949 return false;
2950
2951 if (!m_connectors_editing)
2952 return false;
2953
2954 CutConnectors& connectors = m_c->selection_info()->model_object()->cut_connectors;
2955
2956 if (action == SLAGizmoEventType::LeftDown) {
2957 if (shift_down || alt_down) {
2958 // left down with shift - show the selection rectangle:
2959 if (m_hover_id == -1)
2960 m_selection_rectangle.start_dragging(mouse_position, shift_down ? GLSelectionRectangle::EState::Select : GLSelectionRectangle::EState::Deselect);
2961 }
2962 else
2963 // If there is no selection and no hovering, add new point
2964 if (m_hover_id == -1 && !shift_down && !alt_down)
2965 if (!add_connector(connectors, mouse_position))
2966 m_ldown_mouse_position = mouse_position;
2967 return true;
2968 }
2969
2970 if (action == SLAGizmoEventType::LeftUp && !m_selection_rectangle.is_dragging()) {
2971 if ((m_ldown_mouse_position - mouse_position).norm() < 5.)
2972 unselect_all_connectors();
2973 return is_selection_changed(alt_down, shift_down);
2974 }
2975
2976 // left up with selection rectangle - select points inside the rectangle:
2977 if ((action == SLAGizmoEventType::LeftUp || action == SLAGizmoEventType::ShiftUp || action == SLAGizmoEventType::AltUp) && m_selection_rectangle.is_dragging()) {
2978 // Is this a selection or deselection rectangle?
2979 process_selection_rectangle(connectors);
2980 return true;
2981 }
2982
2983 // dragging the selection rectangle:
2984 if (action == SLAGizmoEventType::Dragging) {
2985 if (m_selection_rectangle.is_dragging()) {
2986 m_selection_rectangle.dragging(mouse_position);
2987 return true;
2988 }
2989 return false;
2990 }
2991
2992 if (action == SLAGizmoEventType::RightDown && !shift_down) {
2993 // If any point is in hover state, this should initiate its move - return control back to GLCanvas:
2994 if (m_hover_id < m_connectors_group_id)
2995 return false;
2996 unselect_all_connectors();
2997 select_connector(m_hover_id - m_connectors_group_id, true);
2998 return delete_selected_connectors(connectors);
2999 }
3000
3001 if (action == SLAGizmoEventType::Delete)
3002 return delete_selected_connectors(connectors);
3003
3004 if (action == SLAGizmoEventType::SelectAll) {
3005 select_all_connectors();
3006 return true;
3007 }
3008
3009 return false;
3010}
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase::EState
EState
Definition GLGizmoBase.hpp:95
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase::is_dragging
bool is_dragging() const
Definition GLGizmoBase.hpp:160
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::process_selection_rectangle
void process_selection_rectangle(CutConnectors &connectors)
Definition GLGizmoCut.cpp:2916
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::select_all_connectors
void select_all_connectors()
Definition GLGizmoCut.cpp:1708
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::is_selection_changed
bool is_selection_changed(bool alt_down, bool shift_down)
Definition GLGizmoCut.cpp:2901
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::select_connector
void select_connector(int idx, bool select)
Definition GLGizmoCut.cpp:2892
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::m_ldown_mouse_position

Definition GLGizmoCut.hpp:73
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::delete_selected_connectors

Definition GLGizmoCut.cpp:2869
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::add_connector

Definition GLGizmoCut.cpp:2840
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::m_selection_rectangle

Definition GLGizmoCut.hpp:136
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::process_cut_line

2140 depth_ratio_tolerance = connector.height_tolerance;

2146

2148 break;

2153 depth_ratio = UndefFloat;
2154 if (!is_approx(depth_ratio_tolerance, connector.height_tolerance))
2155 depth_ratio_tolerance = UndefFloat;

2162 type = CutConnectorType::Undef;

◆ is_conflict_for_connector()

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::is_conflict_for_connector ( size_t  idx,
const CutConnectors &  connectors,
const Vec3d  cur_pos 
)
private
2283{
2284 if (is_outside_of_cut_contour(idx, connectors, cur_pos))
2285 return true;
2286
2287 const CutConnector& cur_connector = connectors[idx];
2288
2289 const Transform3d matrix = translation_transform(cur_pos) * m_rotation_m *
2290 scale_transform(Vec3f(cur_connector.radius, cur_connector.radius, cur_connector.height).cast<double>());
2291 const BoundingBoxf3 cur_tbb = m_shapes[cur_connector.attribs].model.get_bounding_box().transformed(matrix);
2292
2293 // check if connector's bounding box is inside the object's bounding box
2294 if (!m_bounding_box.contains(cur_tbb)) {
2295 m_info_stats.outside_bb++;
2296 return true;
2297 }
2298
2299 // check if connectors are overlapping
2300 for (size_t i = 0; i < connectors.size(); ++i) {
2301 if (i == idx)
2302 continue;
2303 const CutConnector& connector = connectors[i];
2304
2305 if ((connector.pos - cur_connector.pos).norm() < double(connector.radius + cur_connector.radius)) {
2306 m_info_stats.is_overlap = true;
2307 return true;
2308 }
2309 }
2310
2311 return false;
2312}
Slic3r::BoundingBox3Base::contains
bool contains(const PointType &point) const

◆ is_looking_forward()

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::is_looking_forward ( ) const
414{
415 const Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();

◆ is_outside_of_cut_contour()

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::is_outside_of_cut_contour ( size_t  idx,
const CutConnectors &  connectors,
const Vec3d  cur_pos 
)
private
2236{
2237 // check if connector pos is out of clipping plane
2238 if (m_c->object_clipper() && m_c->object_clipper()->is_projection_inside_cut(cur_pos) == -1) {
2239 m_info_stats.outside_cut_contour++;
2240 return true;
2241 }
2242
2243 // check if connector bottom contour is out of clipping plane
2244 const CutConnector& cur_connector = connectors[idx];
2245 const CutConnectorShape shape = CutConnectorShape(cur_connector.attribs.shape);
2246 const int sectorCount = shape == CutConnectorShape::Triangle ? 3 :
2247 shape == CutConnectorShape::Square ? 4 :
2248 shape == CutConnectorShape::Circle ? 60: // supposably, 60 points are enough for conflict detection
2249 shape == CutConnectorShape::Hexagon ? 6 : 1 ;
2250
2251 indexed_triangle_set mesh;
2252 auto& vertices = mesh.vertices;
2253 vertices.reserve(sectorCount + 1);
2254
2255 float fa = 2 * PI / sectorCount;
2256 auto vec = Eigen::Vector2f(0, cur_connector.radius);
2257 for (float angle = 0; angle < 2.f * PI; angle += fa) {
2258 Vec2f p = Eigen::Rotation2Df(angle) * vec;
2259 vertices.emplace_back(Vec3f(p(0), p(1), 0.f));
2260 }
2261 its_transform(mesh, translation_transform(cur_pos) * m_rotation_m);
2262
2263 for (const Vec3f& vertex : vertices) {
2264 if (m_c->object_clipper()) {
2265 int contour_idx = m_c->object_clipper()->is_projection_inside_cut(vertex.cast<double>());
2266 bool is_invalid = (contour_idx == -1);
2267 if (m_part_selection.valid() && ! is_invalid) {
2268 assert(contour_idx >= 0);
2269 const std::vector<size_t>& ignored = *(m_part_selection.get_ignored_contours_ptr());
2270 is_invalid = (std::find(ignored.begin(), ignored.end(), size_t(contour_idx)) != ignored.end());
2271 }
2272 if (is_invalid) {
2273 m_info_stats.outside_cut_contour++;
2274 return true;
2275 }
2276 }
2277 }
2278
2279 return false;
2280}

)
protected
2902{
2903 if (m_hover_id >= m_connectors_group_id) {
2904 if (alt_down)
2905 select_connector(m_hover_id - m_connectors_group_id, false);
2906 else {
2907 if (!shift_down)
2908 unselect_all_connectors();

◆ mouse_position_in_local_plane()

Vec3d Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::mouse_position_in_local_plane ( GrabberID  axis,
const Linef3 &  mouse_ray 
) const
protected
1042{
1043 double half_pi = 0.5 * PI;
1044
1045 Transform3d m = Transform3d::Identity();
1046
1047 switch (axis)
1048 {
1049 case X:
1050 {
1051 m.rotate(Eigen::AngleAxisd(half_pi, Vec3d::UnitZ()));
1052 m.rotate(Eigen::AngleAxisd(-half_pi, Vec3d::UnitY()));
1053 break;
1054 }
1055 case Y:
1056 {
1057 m.rotate(Eigen::AngleAxisd(half_pi, Vec3d::UnitY()));
1058 m.rotate(Eigen::AngleAxisd(half_pi, Vec3d::UnitZ()));
1059 break;
1060 }
1061 default:
1062 case Z:
1063 {
1064 // no rotation applied
1065 break;
1066 }
1067 }
1068
1069 m = m * m_start_dragging_m.inverse();
1070 m.translate(-m_plane_center);
1071
1072 return transform(mouse_ray, m).intersect_plane(0.0);
1073}

1022 return false;

◆ on_mouse()

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::on_mouse ( const wxMouseEvent &  mouse_event)
overridevirtual

Drag of plane.

Parameters
mouse_eventKeep information about mouse click
Returns
Return True when use the information otherwise False.

Reimplemented from Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase.

266{
267 Vec2i mouse_coord(mouse_event.GetX(), mouse_event.GetY());
268 Vec2d mouse_pos = mouse_coord.cast<double>();
269
270 if (mouse_event.ShiftDown() && mouse_event.LeftDown())
271 return gizmo_event(SLAGizmoEventType::LeftDown, mouse_pos, mouse_event.ShiftDown(), mouse_event.AltDown(), mouse_event.CmdDown());
272 if (mouse_event.CmdDown() && mouse_event.LeftDown())
273 return false;
274 if (cut_line_processing()) {
275 if (mouse_event.ShiftDown()) {
276 if (mouse_event.Moving()|| mouse_event.Dragging())
277 return gizmo_event(SLAGizmoEventType::Moving, mouse_pos, mouse_event.ShiftDown(), mouse_event.AltDown(), mouse_event.CmdDown());
278 if (mouse_event.LeftUp())
279 return gizmo_event(SLAGizmoEventType::LeftUp, mouse_pos, mouse_event.ShiftDown(), mouse_event.AltDown(), mouse_event.CmdDown());
280 }
281 discard_cut_line_processing();
282 }
283 else if (mouse_event.Moving())
284 return false;
285
286 if (use_grabbers(mouse_event)) {
287 if (m_hover_id >= m_connectors_group_id) {
288 if (mouse_event.LeftDown() && !mouse_event.CmdDown() && !mouse_event.AltDown())
289 unselect_all_connectors();
290 if (mouse_event.LeftUp() && !mouse_event.ShiftDown())
291 gizmo_event(SLAGizmoEventType::LeftUp, mouse_pos, mouse_event.ShiftDown(), mouse_event.AltDown(), mouse_event.CmdDown());
292 }
293 else if (m_hover_id == CutPlane) {
294 if (mouse_event.LeftDown()) {
295 m_was_cut_plane_dragged = m_was_contour_selected = false;
296
297 // disable / enable current contour
298 Vec3d pos;
299 Vec3d pos_world;
300 m_was_contour_selected = unproject_on_cut_plane(mouse_pos.cast<double>(), pos, pos_world, false);
301 if (m_was_contour_selected) {
302 // Following would inform the clipper about the mouse click, so it can
303 // toggle the respective contour as disabled.
304 //m_c->object_clipper()->pass_mouse_click(pos_world);
305 //process_contours();
306 return true;
307 }
308
309 }
310 else if (mouse_event.LeftUp() && !m_was_cut_plane_dragged && !m_was_contour_selected)
311 flip_cut_plane();
312 }
313
314 if (m_part_selection.valid())
315 m_parent.toggle_model_objects_visibility(false);
316 return true;
317 }
318
319 static bool pending_right_up = false;
320 if (mouse_event.LeftDown()) {
321 bool grabber_contains_mouse = (get_hover_id() != -1);
322 const bool shift_down = mouse_event.ShiftDown();
323 if ((!shift_down || grabber_contains_mouse) &&
324 gizmo_event(SLAGizmoEventType::LeftDown, mouse_pos, mouse_event.ShiftDown(), mouse_event.AltDown(), false))
325 return true;
326 }
327 else if (mouse_event.Dragging()) {
328 bool control_down = mouse_event.CmdDown();
329 if (m_parent.get_move_volume_id() != -1) {
330 // don't allow dragging objects with the Sla gizmo on
331 return true;
332 }
333 if (!control_down &&
334 gizmo_event(SLAGizmoEventType::Dragging, mouse_pos, mouse_event.ShiftDown(), mouse_event.AltDown(), false)) {
335 // the gizmo got the event and took some action, no need to do
336 // anything more here
337 m_parent.set_as_dirty();
338 return true;
339 }
340 if (control_down && (mouse_event.LeftIsDown() || mouse_event.RightIsDown())) {
341 // CTRL has been pressed while already dragging -> stop current action
342 if (mouse_event.LeftIsDown())
343 gizmo_event(SLAGizmoEventType::LeftUp, mouse_pos, mouse_event.ShiftDown(), mouse_event.AltDown(), true);
344 else if (mouse_event.RightIsDown())
345 pending_right_up = false;
346 }
347 }
348 else if (mouse_event.LeftUp() && !m_parent.is_mouse_dragging()) {
349 // in case SLA/FDM gizmo is selected, we just pass the LeftUp event
350 // and stop processing - neither object moving or selecting is
351 // suppressed in that case
352 gizmo_event(SLAGizmoEventType::LeftUp, mouse_pos, mouse_event.ShiftDown(), mouse_event.AltDown(), mouse_event.CmdDown());
353 return true;
354 }
355 else if (mouse_event.RightDown()) {
356 if (! m_connectors_editing && mouse_event.GetModifiers() == wxMOD_NONE) {
357 // Check the internal part raycasters.
358 if (! m_part_selection.valid())
359 process_contours();
360 m_part_selection.toggle_selection(mouse_pos);
361 check_and_update_connectors_state(); // after a contour is deactivated, its connectors are inside the object
362 return true;
363 }
364
365 if (m_parent.get_selection().get_object_idx() != -1 &&
366 gizmo_event(SLAGizmoEventType::RightDown, mouse_pos, false, false, false)) {
367 // we need to set the following right up as processed to avoid showing
368 // the context menu if the user release the mouse over the object
369 pending_right_up = true;
370 // event was taken care of by the SlaSupports gizmo
371 return true;
372 }
373 }
374 else if (pending_right_up && mouse_event.RightUp()) {
375 pending_right_up = false;
376 return true;
377 }
378 return false;
379}
Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::is_mouse_dragging
bool is_mouse_dragging() const
Definition GLCanvas3D.hpp:931
Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::get_move_volume_id
int get_move_volume_id() const
Definition GLCanvas3D.hpp:903

void toggle_model_objects_visibility(bool visible, const ModelObject *mo=nullptr, int instance_idx=-1, const ModelVolume *mv=nullptr)

function which Set up m_dragging and call functions on_start_dragging / on_dragging / on_stop_draggin...
Definition GLGizmoBase.cpp:229
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase::get_hover_id

Definition GLGizmoBase.hpp:157
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::PartSelection::toggle_selection

Definition GLGizmoCut.cpp:1565
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::m_was_contour_selected
bool m_was_contour_selected
Definition GLGizmoCut.hpp:140
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::flip_cut_plane
void flip_cut_plane()
Definition GLGizmoCut.cpp:1873
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::gizmo_event
bool gizmo_event(SLAGizmoEventType action, const Vec2d &mouse_position, bool shift_down, bool alt_down, bool control_down)
Definition GLGizmoCut.cpp:2939
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::cut_line_processing
bool cut_line_processing() const
Definition GLGizmoCut.cpp:2773
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::process_contours
void process_contours()

◆ on_register_raycasters_for_picking()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::on_register_raycasters_for_picking ( )
overrideprotectedvirtual

Reimplemented from Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase.

891{
892 assert(m_raycasters.empty());
893 // the gizmo grabbers are rendered on top of the scene, so the raytraced picker should take it into account
894 m_parent.set_raycaster_gizmos_on_top(true);
895
896 init_picking_models();
897
898 if (m_connectors_editing) {
899 if (CommonGizmosDataObjects::SelectionInfo* si = m_c->selection_info()) {
900 const CutConnectors& connectors = si->model_object()->cut_connectors;
901 for (int i = 0; i < int(connectors.size()); ++i)
902 m_raycasters.emplace_back(m_parent.add_raycaster_for_picking(SceneRaycaster::EType::Gizmo, i + m_connectors_group_id, *(m_shapes[connectors[i].attribs]).mesh_raycaster, Transform3d::Identity()));
903 }
904 }
905 else if (!cut_line_processing()) {
906 m_raycasters.emplace_back(m_parent.add_raycaster_for_picking(SceneRaycaster::EType::Gizmo, X, *m_cone.mesh_raycaster, Transform3d::Identity()));
907 m_raycasters.emplace_back(m_parent.add_raycaster_for_picking(SceneRaycaster::EType::Gizmo, X, *m_cone.mesh_raycaster, Transform3d::Identity()));
908
909 m_raycasters.emplace_back(m_parent.add_raycaster_for_picking(SceneRaycaster::EType::Gizmo, Y, *m_cone.mesh_raycaster, Transform3d::Identity()));
910 m_raycasters.emplace_back(m_parent.add_raycaster_for_picking(SceneRaycaster::EType::Gizmo, Y, *m_cone.mesh_raycaster, Transform3d::Identity()));
911
912 m_raycasters.emplace_back(m_parent.add_raycaster_for_picking(SceneRaycaster::EType::Gizmo, Z, *m_sphere.mesh_raycaster, Transform3d::Identity()));
913
914 m_raycasters.emplace_back(m_parent.add_raycaster_for_picking(SceneRaycaster::EType::Gizmo, CutPlane, *m_plane.mesh_raycaster, Transform3d::Identity()));
915 }
916
917 update_raycasters_for_picking_transform();
918}

◆ on_set_state()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::on_set_state ( )
overrideprotectedvirtual

Reimplemented from Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase.

856{
857 if (m_state == On) {
858 m_parent.set_use_color_clip_plane(true);
859 m_parent.set_color_clip_plane_colors({ UPPER_PART_COLOR , LOWER_PART_COLOR });
860
861 update_bb();
862 m_connectors_editing = !m_selected.empty();
863 m_transformed_bounding_box = transformed_bounding_box(m_plane_center, m_rotation_m);
864
865 // initiate archived values
866 m_ar_plane_center = m_plane_center;
867 m_start_dragging_m = m_rotation_m;
868 reset_cut_by_contours();
869
870 m_parent.request_extra_frame();
871 }
872 else {
873 if (auto oc = m_c->object_clipper()) {
874 oc->set_behavior(true, true, 0.);
875 oc->release();
876 }
877 m_selected.clear();
878 m_parent.set_use_color_clip_plane(false);
879 m_c->selection_info()->set_use_shift(false);
880
881 // Make sure that the part selection data are released when the gizmo is closed.
882 // The CallAfter is needed because in perform_cut, the gizmo is closed BEFORE
883 // the cut is performed (because of undo/redo snapshots), so the data would
884 // be deleted prematurely.
885 if (m_part_selection.valid())
886 wxGetApp().CallAfter([this]() { m_part_selection = PartSelection(); });
887 }
888}

1196{

1200 Plater::TakeSnapshot snapshot(wxGetApp().plater(), _L("Rotate cut plane"), UndoRedo::SnapshotType::GizmoAction);

Here is the caller graph for this function:

◆ perform_cut()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::perform_cut ( const Selection &  selection)
private
2496{
2497 if (!can_perform_cut())
2498 return;
2499 const int instance_idx = selection.get_instance_idx();
2500 const int object_idx = selection.get_object_idx();
2501
2502 wxCHECK_RET(instance_idx >= 0 && object_idx >= 0, "GLGizmoCut: Invalid object selection");
2503
2504 Plater* plater = wxGetApp().plater();
2505 ModelObject* mo = plater->model().objects[object_idx];
2506 if (!mo)
2507 return;
2508
2509 // deactivate CutGizmo and than perform a cut
2510 m_parent.reset_all_gizmos();
2511
2512 // perform cut
2513 {
2514 Plater::TakeSnapshot snapshot(wxGetApp().plater(), _L("Cut by Plane"));
2515
2516 // This shall delete the part selection class and deallocate the memory.
2517 ScopeGuard part_selection_killer([this]() { m_part_selection = PartSelection(); });
2518
2519 const bool cut_by_contour = m_part_selection.valid();
2520 ModelObject* cut_mo = cut_by_contour ? m_part_selection.model_object() : nullptr;
2521 if (cut_mo)
2522 cut_mo->cut_connectors = mo->cut_connectors;
2523 else
2524 cut_mo = mo;
2525
2526 int dowels_count = 0;
2527 const bool has_connectors = !mo->cut_connectors.empty();
2528 // update connectors pos as offset of its center before cut performing
2529 apply_connectors_in_model(cut_mo , dowels_count);
2530
2531 wxBusyCursor wait;
2532
2533 const Transform3d cut_matrix = get_cut_matrix(selection);
2534
2535 ModelObjectCutAttributes attributes = only_if(has_connectors ? true : m_keep_upper, ModelObjectCutAttribute::KeepUpper) |
2536 only_if(has_connectors ? true : m_keep_lower, ModelObjectCutAttribute::KeepLower) |
2537 only_if(has_connectors ? false : m_keep_as_parts, ModelObjectCutAttribute::KeepAsParts) |
2538 only_if(m_place_on_cut_upper, ModelObjectCutAttribute::PlaceOnCutUpper) |
2539 only_if(m_place_on_cut_lower, ModelObjectCutAttribute::PlaceOnCutLower) |
2540 only_if(m_rotate_upper, ModelObjectCutAttribute::FlipUpper) |
2541 only_if(m_rotate_lower, ModelObjectCutAttribute::FlipLower) |
2542 only_if(dowels_count > 0, ModelObjectCutAttribute::CreateDowels) |
2543 only_if(!has_connectors && cut_mo->cut_id.id().invalid(), ModelObjectCutAttribute::InvalidateCutInfo);
2544
2545 // update cut_id for the cut object in respect to the attributes
2546 update_object_cut_id(cut_mo->cut_id, attributes, dowels_count);
2547
2548 ModelObjectPtrs cut_object_ptrs;
2549 if (cut_by_contour) {
2550 // Clone the object to duplicate instances, materials etc.
2551 ModelObject* upper{ nullptr };
2552 if (m_keep_upper) cut_mo->clone_for_cut(&upper);
2553 ModelObject* lower{ nullptr };
2554 if (m_keep_lower) cut_mo->clone_for_cut(&lower);
2555
2556 auto add_cut_objects = [this, &instance_idx, &cut_matrix](ModelObjectPtrs& cut_objects, ModelObject* upper, ModelObject* lower) {
2557 if (upper && !upper->volumes.empty()) {
2558 ModelObject::reset_instance_transformation(upper, instance_idx, cut_matrix, m_place_on_cut_upper, m_rotate_upper);
2559 cut_objects.push_back(upper);
2560 }
2561 if (lower && !lower->volumes.empty()) {
2562 ModelObject::reset_instance_transformation(lower, instance_idx, cut_matrix, m_place_on_cut_lower, m_place_on_cut_lower || m_rotate_lower);
2563 cut_objects.push_back(lower);
2564 }
2565 };
2566
2567 const size_t cut_parts_cnt = m_part_selection.parts().size();
2568 bool has_modifiers = false;
2569
2570 // Distribute SolidParts to the Upper/Lower object
2571 for (size_t id = 0; id < cut_parts_cnt; ++id) {
2572 if (m_part_selection.parts()[id].is_modifier)
2573 has_modifiers = true; // modifiers will be added later to the related parts
2574 else if (ModelObject* obj = (m_part_selection.parts()[id].selected ? upper : lower))
2575 obj->add_volume(*(cut_mo->volumes[id]));
2576 }
2577
2578 if (has_modifiers) {
2579 // Distribute Modifiers to the Upper/Lower object
2580 auto upper_bb = upper ? upper->instance_bounding_box(instance_idx) : BoundingBoxf3();
2581 auto lower_bb = lower ? lower->instance_bounding_box(instance_idx) : BoundingBoxf3();
2582 const Transform3d inst_matrix = cut_mo->instances[instance_idx]->get_transformation().get_matrix();
2583
2584 for (size_t id = 0; id < cut_parts_cnt; ++id)
2585 if (m_part_selection.parts()[id].is_modifier) {
2586 ModelVolume* vol = cut_mo->volumes[id];
2587 auto bb = vol->mesh().transformed_bounding_box(inst_matrix * vol->get_matrix());
2588 // Don't add modifiers which are not intersecting with solid parts
2589 if (upper_bb.intersects(bb))
2590 upper->add_volume(*vol);
2591 if (lower_bb.intersects(bb))
2592 lower->add_volume(*vol);
2593 }
2594 }
2595
2596 ModelVolumePtrs& volumes = cut_mo->volumes;
2597 if (volumes.size() == cut_parts_cnt) {
2598 // Means that object is cut without connectors
2599
2600 // Just add Upper and Lower objects to cut_object_ptrs
2601 add_cut_objects(cut_object_ptrs, upper, lower);
2602 }
2603 else if (volumes.size() > cut_parts_cnt) {
2604 // Means that object is cut with connectors
2605
2606 // All volumes are distributed to Upper / Lower object,
2607 // So we don’t need them anymore
2608 for (size_t id = 0; id < cut_parts_cnt; id++)
2609 delete *(volumes.begin() + id);
2610 volumes.erase(volumes.begin(), volumes.begin() + cut_parts_cnt);
2611
2612 // Perform cut just to get connectors
2613 const ModelObjectPtrs cut_connectors_obj = cut_mo->cut(instance_idx, get_cut_matrix(selection), attributes);
2614 assert(dowels_count > 0 ? cut_connectors_obj.size() >= 3 : cut_connectors_obj.size() == 2);
2615
2616 // Connectors from upper object
2617 for (const ModelVolume* volume : cut_connectors_obj[0]->volumes)
2618 upper->add_volume(*volume, volume->type());
2619
2620 // Connectors from lower object
2621 for (const ModelVolume* volume : cut_connectors_obj[1]->volumes)
2622 lower->add_volume(*volume, volume->type());
2623
2624 // Add Upper and Lower objects to cut_object_ptrs
2625 add_cut_objects(cut_object_ptrs, upper, lower);
2626
2627 // Add Dowel-connectors as separate objects to cut_object_ptrs
2628 if (cut_connectors_obj.size() >= 3)
2629 for (size_t id = 2; id < cut_connectors_obj.size(); id++)
2630 cut_object_ptrs.push_back(cut_connectors_obj[id]);
2631 }
2632
2633 // Now merge all model parts together:
2634 {
2635 for (ModelObject* mo : cut_object_ptrs) {
2636 TriangleMesh mesh;
2637 // Merge all SolidPart but not Connectors
2638 for (const ModelVolume* mv : mo->volumes) {
2639 if (mv->is_model_part() && !mv->is_cut_connector()) {
2640 TriangleMesh m = mv->mesh();
2641 m.transform(mv->get_matrix());
2642 mesh.merge(m);
2643 }
2644 }
2645 if (! mesh.empty()) {
2646 ModelVolume* new_volume = mo->add_volume(mesh);
2647 new_volume->name = mo->name;
2648 // Delete all merged SolidPart but not Connectors
2649 for (int i=int(mo->volumes.size())-2; i>=0; --i) {
2650 const ModelVolume* mv = mo->volumes[i];
2651 if (mv->is_model_part() && !mv->is_cut_connector())
2652 mo->delete_volume(i);
2653 }
2654 }
2655 }
2656 }
2657 }
2658 else
2659 cut_object_ptrs = cut_mo->cut(instance_idx, cut_matrix, attributes);
2660
2661 // save cut_id to post update synchronization
2662 const CutObjectBase cut_id = cut_mo->cut_id;
2663
2664 // update cut results on plater and in the model
2665 plater->cut(object_idx, cut_object_ptrs);
2666
2667 synchronize_model_after_cut(plater->model(), cut_id);
2668 }
2669}
Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::reset_all_gizmos
void reset_all_gizmos()

◆ process_cut_line()

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::process_cut_line ( SLAGizmoEventType  action,
const Vec2d &  mouse_position 
)
private
2784{
2785 const Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
2786
2787 Vec3d pt;
2788 Vec3d dir;
2789 MeshRaycaster::line_from_mouse_pos(mouse_position, Transform3d::Identity(), camera, pt, dir);
2790 dir.normalize();
2791 pt += dir; // Move the pt along dir so it is not clipped.
2792
2793 if (action == SLAGizmoEventType::LeftDown && !cut_line_processing()) {
2794 m_line_beg = pt;
2795 m_line_end = pt;
2796 on_unregister_raycasters_for_picking();
2797 return true;
2798 }
2799
2800 if (cut_line_processing()) {
2801 reset_cut_by_contours();
2802
2803 m_line_end = pt;
2804 if (action == SLAGizmoEventType::LeftDown || action == SLAGizmoEventType::LeftUp) {
2805 Vec3d line_dir = m_line_end - m_line_beg;
2806 if (line_dir.norm() < 3.0)
2807 return true;
2808
2809 Vec3d cross_dir = line_dir.cross(dir).normalized();
2810 Eigen::Quaterniond q;
2811 Transform3d m = Transform3d::Identity();
2812 m.matrix().block(0, 0, 3, 3) = q.setFromTwoVectors(Vec3d::UnitZ(), cross_dir).toRotationMatrix();
2813
2814 const Vec3d new_plane_center = m_bb_center + cross_dir * cross_dir.dot(pt - m_bb_center);
2815 // update transformed bb
2816 const auto new_tbb = transformed_bounding_box(new_plane_center, m);
2817 const GLVolume* first_volume = m_parent.get_selection().get_first_volume();
2818 Vec3d instance_offset = first_volume->get_instance_offset();
2819 instance_offset[Z] += first_volume->get_sla_shift_z();
2820
2821 const Vec3d trans_center_pos = m.inverse() * (new_plane_center - instance_offset) + new_tbb.center();
2822 if (new_tbb.contains(trans_center_pos)) {
2823 Plater::TakeSnapshot snapshot(wxGetApp().plater(), _L("Cut by line"), UndoRedo::SnapshotType::GizmoAction);
2824 m_transformed_bounding_box = new_tbb;
2825 set_center(new_plane_center);
2826 m_start_dragging_m = m_rotation_m = m;
2827 m_ar_plane_center = m_plane_center;
2828 }
2829
2830 m_angle_arc.reset();
2831 discard_cut_line_processing();
2832 }
2833 else if (action == SLAGizmoEventType::Moving)
2834 this->set_dirty();
2835 return true;
2836 }
2837 return false;
2838}

◆ process_selection_rectangle()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::process_selection_rectangle ( CutConnectors &  connectors)
protected
2917{
2918 GLSelectionRectangle::EState rectangle_status = m_selection_rectangle.get_state();
2919
2920 ModelObject* mo = m_c->selection_info()->model_object();
2921 int active_inst = m_c->selection_info()->get_active_instance();
2922
2923 // First collect positions of all the points in world coordinates.
2924 Transformation trafo = mo->instances[active_inst]->get_transformation();
2925 trafo.set_offset(trafo.get_offset() + double(m_c->selection_info()->get_sla_shift()) * Vec3d::UnitZ());
2926
2927 std::vector<Vec3d> points;
2928 for (const CutConnector&connector : connectors)
2929 points.push_back(connector.pos + trafo.get_offset());
2930
2931 // Now ask the rectangle which of the points are inside.
2932 std::vector<unsigned int> points_idxs = m_selection_rectangle.contains(points);
2933 m_selection_rectangle.stop_dragging();
2934
2935 for (size_t idx : points_idxs)
2936 select_connector(int(idx), rectangle_status == GLSelectionRectangle::EState::Select);
2937}

◆ put_connectors_on_cut_plane()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::put_connectors_on_cut_plane ( const Vec3d &  cp_normal,
double  cp_offset 
)
394{
395 ModelObject* mo = m_c->selection_info()->model_object();
396 if (CutConnectors& connectors = mo->cut_connectors; !connectors.empty()) {
397 const float sla_shift = m_c->selection_info()->get_sla_shift();
398 const Vec3d& instance_offset = mo->instances[m_c->selection_info()->get_active_instance()]->get_offset();
399
400 for (auto& connector : connectors) {
401 // convert connetor pos to the world coordinates
402 Vec3d pos = connector.pos + instance_offset;
403 pos[Z] += sla_shift;
404 // scalar distance from point to plane along the normal
405 double distance = -cp_normal.dot(pos) + cp_offset;
406 // move connector
407 connector.pos += distance * cp_normal;
408 }
409 }
410}

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::render_clipper_cut ( )
private
1369{
1370 if (! m_connectors_editing)
1371 ::glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
1372

573 }

◆ render_connectors()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::render_connectors ( )
private
2336{
2337 ::glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
2338
2339 if (m_is_contour_changed || cut_line_processing() ||
2340 m_connector_mode == CutConnectorMode::Auto || !m_c->selection_info())
2341 return;
2342
2343 const ModelObject* mo = m_c->selection_info()->model_object();
2344 auto inst_id = m_c->selection_info()->get_active_instance();
2345 if (inst_id < 0)
2346 return;
2347 const CutConnectors& connectors = mo->cut_connectors;
2348 if (connectors.size() != m_selected.size()) {
2349 // #ysFIXME
2350 clear_selection();
2351 m_selected.resize(connectors.size(), false);
2352 }
2353
2354 ColorRGBA render_color = CONNECTOR_DEF_COLOR;
2355
2356 const ModelInstance* mi = mo->instances[inst_id];
2357 const Vec3d& instance_offset = mi->get_offset();
2358 const double sla_shift = double(m_c->selection_info()->get_sla_shift());
2359
2360 const bool looking_forward = is_looking_forward();
2361
2362 for (size_t i = 0; i < connectors.size(); ++i) {
2363 const CutConnector& connector = connectors[i];
2364
2365 float height = connector.height;
2366 // recalculate connector position to world position
2367 Vec3d pos = connector.pos + instance_offset + sla_shift * Vec3d::UnitZ();
2368
2369 // First decide about the color of the point.
2370 assert(std::is_sorted(m_invalid_connectors_idxs.begin(), m_invalid_connectors_idxs.end()));
2371 const bool conflict_connector = std::binary_search(m_invalid_connectors_idxs.begin(), m_invalid_connectors_idxs.end(), i);
2372 if (conflict_connector)
2373 render_color = CONNECTOR_ERR_COLOR;
2374 else // default connector color
2375 render_color = connector.attribs.type == CutConnectorType::Dowel ? DOWEL_COLOR : PLAG_COLOR;
2376
2377 if (!m_connectors_editing)
2378 render_color = CONNECTOR_ERR_COLOR;
2379 else if (size_t(m_hover_id - m_connectors_group_id) == i)
2380 render_color = conflict_connector ? HOVERED_ERR_COLOR :
2381 connector.attribs.type == CutConnectorType::Dowel ? HOVERED_DOWEL_COLOR : HOVERED_PLAG_COLOR;
2382 else if (m_selected[i])
2383 render_color = connector.attribs.type == CutConnectorType::Dowel ? SELECTED_DOWEL_COLOR : SELECTED_PLAG_COLOR;
2384
2385 const Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
2386 if (connector.attribs.type == CutConnectorType::Dowel &&
2387 connector.attribs.style == CutConnectorStyle::Prism) {
2388 if (m_connectors_editing) {
2389 height = 0.05f;
2390 if (!looking_forward)
2391 pos += 0.05 * m_clp_normal;
2392 }
2393 else {
2394 if (looking_forward)
2395 pos -= static_cast<double>(height) * m_clp_normal;
2396 else
2397 pos += static_cast<double>(height) * m_clp_normal;
2398 height *= 2;
2399 }
2400 }
2401 else if (!looking_forward)
2402 pos += 0.05 * m_clp_normal;
2403
2404 const Transform3d view_model_matrix = camera.get_view_matrix() * translation_transform(pos) * m_rotation_m *
2405 scale_transform(Vec3f(connector.radius, connector.radius, height).cast<double>());
2406
2407 render_model(m_shapes[connector.attribs].model, render_color, view_model_matrix);
2408 }
2409}

1786 m_imgui->disabled_end();
1787
1788 if (render_combo(m_labels_map["Shape"], m_connector_shapes, m_connector_shape_id))
1789 apply_selected_connectors([this, &connectors](size_t idx) { connectors[idx].attribs.shape = CutConnectorShape(m_connector_shape_id); });
1790
1791 if (render_slider_double_input(m_labels_map["Depth"], m_connector_depth_ratio, m_connector_depth_ratio_tolerance))
1792 apply_selected_connectors([this, &connectors](size_t idx) {
1793 if (m_connector_depth_ratio > 0)
1794 connectors[idx].height = m_connector_depth_ratio;
1795 if (m_connector_depth_ratio_tolerance >= 0)
1796 connectors[idx].height_tolerance = m_connector_depth_ratio_tolerance;
1797 });
1798
1799 if (render_slider_double_input(m_labels_map["Size"], m_connector_size, m_connector_size_tolerance))
1800 apply_selected_connectors([this, &connectors](size_t idx) {
1801 if (m_connector_size > 0)
1802 connectors[idx].radius = 0.5f * m_connector_size;
1803 if (m_connector_size_tolerance >= 0)
1804 connectors[idx].radius_tolerance = 0.5f * m_connector_size_tolerance;
1805 });
1806
1807 ImGui::Separator();
1808
1809 if (m_imgui->button(_L("Confirm connectors"))) {
1810 unselect_all_connectors();
1811 set_connectors_editing(false);
1812 }
1813
1814 ImGui::SameLine(m_label_width + 1.15f * m_control_width);
1815
1816 if (m_imgui->button(_L("Cancel"))) {
1817 reset_connectors();
1818 set_connectors_editing(false);
1819 }
1820}

◆ render_cut_line()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::render_cut_line ( )
private
800{
801 if (!cut_line_processing() || m_line_end.isApprox(Vec3d::Zero()))
802 return;
803
804 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST));
805 glsafe(::glClear(GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT));
806
807 m_cut_line.reset();
808 m_cut_line.init_from(its_make_line((Vec3f)m_line_beg.cast<float>(), (Vec3f)m_line_end.cast<float>()));
809
810 render_line(m_cut_line, GRABBER_COLOR, wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera().get_view_matrix(), 0.25f);
811}

◆ render_cut_plane()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::render_cut_plane ( )
private
610{
611 if (cut_line_processing())
612 return;
613
614 GLShaderProgram* shader = wxGetApp().get_shader("flat");
615 if (shader == nullptr)
616 return;
617
618 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST));
619 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE));
620 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_BLEND));
621 glsafe(::glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA));
622
623 shader->start_using();
624
625 const Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
626 const Transform3d view_model_matrix = camera.get_view_matrix() * translation_transform(m_plane_center) * m_rotation_m;
627
628 shader->set_uniform("view_model_matrix", view_model_matrix);
629 shader->set_uniform("projection_matrix", camera.get_projection_matrix());
630
631 if (can_perform_cut() && has_valid_contour()) {
632 if (m_hover_id == CutPlane)
633 m_plane.model.set_color({ 0.9f, 0.9f, 0.9f, 0.5f });
634 else
635 m_plane.model.set_color({ 0.8f, 0.8f, 0.8f, 0.5f });
636 }
637 else
638 m_plane.model.set_color({ 1.0f, 0.8f, 0.8f, 0.5f });
639 m_plane.model.render();
640
641 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE));
642 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_BLEND));
643
644 shader->stop_using();
645}
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::has_valid_contour
bool has_valid_contour() const
Definition GLGizmoCut.cpp:2421
Slic3r::GUI::GLModel::render
void render()
Definition GLModel.cpp:755

◆ render_cut_plane_grabbers()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::render_cut_plane_grabbers ( )
private
735{
736 glsafe(::glClear(GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT));
737
738 ColorRGBA color = ColorRGBA::GRAY();
739
740 const Transform3d view_matrix = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera().get_view_matrix() * translation_transform(m_plane_center) * m_rotation_m;
741
742 const double mean_size = get_grabber_mean_size(m_bounding_box);
743 double size;
744
745 const bool dragging_by_cut_plane = m_dragging && m_hover_id == CutPlane;
746
747 if (!dragging_by_cut_plane) {
748 render_grabber_connection(GRABBER_COLOR, view_matrix);
749
750 // render sphere grabber
751 size = m_dragging ? get_dragging_half_size(mean_size) : get_half_size(mean_size);
752 color = m_hover_id == Y ? complementary(ColorRGBA::GREEN()) :
753 m_hover_id == X ? complementary(ColorRGBA::RED()) :
754 m_hover_id == Z ? GRABBER_COLOR : ColorRGBA::GRAY();
755 render_model(m_sphere.model, color, view_matrix * translation_transform(m_grabber_connection_len * Vec3d::UnitZ()) * scale_transform(size));
756 }
757
758 const bool no_one_grabber_hovered = !m_dragging && (m_hover_id < 0 || m_hover_id == CutPlane);
759
760 // render X grabber
761
762 if (no_one_grabber_hovered || m_hover_id == X)
763 {
764 size = m_dragging && m_hover_id == X ? get_dragging_half_size(mean_size) : get_half_size(mean_size);
765 const Vec3d cone_scale = Vec3d(0.75 * size, 0.75 * size, 1.8 * size);
766 color = m_hover_id == X ? complementary(ColorRGBA::RED()) : ColorRGBA::RED();
767
768 if (m_hover_id == X) {
769 render_grabber_connection(color, view_matrix);
770 render_rotation_snapping(X, color);
771 }
772
773 Vec3d offset = Vec3d(0.0, 1.25 * size, m_grabber_connection_len);
774 render_model(m_cone.model, color, view_matrix * translation_transform(offset) * rotation_transform(-0.5 * PI * Vec3d::UnitX()) * scale_transform(cone_scale));
775 offset = Vec3d(0.0, -1.25 * size, m_grabber_connection_len);
776 render_model(m_cone.model, color, view_matrix * translation_transform(offset) * rotation_transform(0.5 * PI * Vec3d::UnitX()) * scale_transform(cone_scale));
777 }
778
779 // render Y grabber
780
781 if (no_one_grabber_hovered || m_hover_id == Y)
782 {
783 size = m_dragging && m_hover_id == Y ? get_dragging_half_size(mean_size) : get_half_size(mean_size);
784 const Vec3d cone_scale = Vec3d(0.75 * size, 0.75 * size, 1.8 * size);
785 color = m_hover_id == Y ? complementary(ColorRGBA::GREEN()) : ColorRGBA::GREEN();
786
787 if (m_hover_id == Y) {
788 render_grabber_connection(color, view_matrix);
789 render_rotation_snapping(Y, color);
790 }
791
792 Vec3d offset = Vec3d(1.25 * size, 0.0, m_grabber_connection_len);
793 render_model(m_cone.model, color, view_matrix * translation_transform(offset) * rotation_transform(0.5 * PI * Vec3d::UnitY()) * scale_transform(cone_scale));
794 offset = Vec3d(-1.25 * size, 0.0, m_grabber_connection_len);
795 render_model(m_cone.model, color, view_matrix * translation_transform(offset)* rotation_transform(-0.5 * PI * Vec3d::UnitY()) * scale_transform(cone_scale));
796 }
797}

2026 {
2027 float shift = m_imgui->scaled(1.2f);
2028 if (suffix == "##lower")
2029 shift += h_shift;
2030 m_imgui->disabled_begin(!keep_part || m_keep_as_parts);

2033 rotate_part = false;
2034 place_on_cut_part = false;
2035 }
2036
2037 add_horizontal_shift(shift);
2038 if (m_imgui->radio_button(m_part_orientation_names.at("on_cut") + suffix, place_on_cut_part)) {
2039 place_on_cut_part = !place_on_cut_part;
2040 rotate_part = false;
2041 }
2042
2043 add_horizontal_shift(shift);
2044 if (m_imgui->radio_button(m_part_orientation_names.at("flip") + suffix, rotate_part)) {
2045 rotate_part = !rotate_part;
2046 place_on_cut_part = false;
2047 }

2049 };

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::render_double_input ( const std::string &  label,
double &  value_in 
)
private
481{
482 ImGui::AlignTextToFramePadding();
483 m_imgui->text(label);
484 ImGui::SameLine(m_label_width);
485 ImGui::PushItemWidth(m_control_width);
486
487 double value = value_in;
488 if (m_imperial_units)
489 value *= ObjectManipulation::mm_to_in;
490 double old_val = value;
491 ImGui::InputDouble(("##" + label).c_str(), &value, 0.0f, 0.0f, "%.2f", ImGuiInputTextFlags_CharsDecimal);
492
493 ImGui::SameLine();
494 m_imgui->text(m_imperial_units ? _L("in") : _L("mm"));
495
496 value_in = value * (m_imperial_units ? ObjectManipulation::in_to_mm : 1.0);
497 return !is_approx(old_val, value);
498}

◆ render_grabbers() [3/3]

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase::render_grabbers ( size_t  first,
size_t  last,
float  size,
bool  force_hover 
) const
protectedinherited
212{
213 GLShaderProgram* shader = wxGetApp().get_shader("gouraud_light");
214 if (shader == nullptr)
215 return;
216 shader->start_using();
217 shader->set_uniform("emission_factor", 0.1f);
218 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE));
219 for (size_t i = first; i <= last; ++i) {
220 if (m_grabbers[i].enabled)
221 m_grabbers[i].render(force_hover ? true : m_hover_id == (int)i, size);
222 }
223 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE));
224 shader->stop_using();
225}

References glsafe, Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase::m_grabbers, Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase::m_hover_id, Slic3r::GLShaderProgram::set_uniform(), Slic3r::GLShaderProgram::start_using(), and Slic3r::GLShaderProgram::stop_using().

◆ render_input_window()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase::render_input_window ( float  x,
float  y,
float  bottom_limit 
)
inherited
316{
317 on_render_input_window(x, y, bottom_limit);
318 if (m_first_input_window_render) {
319 // imgui windows that don't have an initial size needs to be processed once to get one
320 // and are not rendered in the first frame
321 // so, we forces to render another frame the first time the imgui window is shown
322 // https://github.com/ocornut/imgui/issues/2949
323 m_parent.set_as_dirty();
324 m_parent.request_extra_frame();
325 m_first_input_window_render = false;
326 }
327}

679{
680 GLShaderProgram* shader = OpenGLManager::get_gl_info().is_core_profile() ? wxGetApp().get_shader("dashed_thick_lines") : wxGetApp().get_shader("flat");

548 if (m_imperial_units)
549 value *= ObjectManipulation::mm_to_in;

◆ render_rotation_snapping()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::render_rotation_snapping ( GrabberID  axis,
const ColorRGBA &  color 
)
private
696{
697 GLShaderProgram* line_shader = OpenGLManager::get_gl_info().is_core_profile() ? wxGetApp().get_shader("dashed_thick_lines") : wxGetApp().get_shader("flat");
698 if (!line_shader)
699 return;
700
701 const Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
702 Transform3d view_model_matrix = camera.get_view_matrix() * translation_transform(m_plane_center) * m_start_dragging_m;
703
704 if (axis == X)
705 view_model_matrix = view_model_matrix * rotation_transform(0.5 * PI * Vec3d::UnitY()) * rotation_transform(-PI * Vec3d::UnitZ());
706 else
707 view_model_matrix = view_model_matrix * rotation_transform(-0.5 * PI * Vec3d::UnitZ()) * rotation_transform(-0.5 * PI * Vec3d::UnitY());
708
709 line_shader->start_using();
710 line_shader->set_uniform("projection_matrix", camera.get_projection_matrix());
711 line_shader->set_uniform("view_model_matrix", view_model_matrix);
712 line_shader->set_uniform("width", 0.25f);
713
714 m_circle.render();
715 m_scale.render();
716 m_snap_radii.render();
717 m_reference_radius.render();
718 if (m_dragging) {
719 line_shader->set_uniform("width", 1.5f);
720 m_angle_arc.set_color(color);
721 m_angle_arc.render();
722 }
723
724 line_shader->stop_using();
725}

◆ render_slider_double_input()

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::render_slider_double_input ( const std::string &  label,
float &  value_in,
float &  tolerance_in 
)
private
501{
502 constexpr float UndefMinVal = -0.1f;
503 const float f_mm_to_in = static_cast<float>(ObjectManipulation::mm_to_in);
504
505 auto render_slider = [this, UndefMinVal, f_mm_to_in]
506 (const std::string& label, float& val, float def_val, float max_val, const wxString& tooltip) {
507 float min_val = val < 0.f ? UndefMinVal : def_val;
508 float value = val;
509 if (m_imperial_units) {
510 min_val *= f_mm_to_in;
511 value *= f_mm_to_in;
512 }
513 const float old_val = value;
514 const std::string format = val < 0.f ? UndefLabel : (m_imperial_units ? "%.4f " + _u8L("in") : "%.2f " + _u8L("mm"));
515
516 m_imgui->slider_float(label.c_str(), &value, min_val, max_val, format.c_str(), 1.f, true, tooltip);
517 val = value * (m_imperial_units ? static_cast<float>(ObjectManipulation::in_to_mm) : 1.f);
518
519 return !is_approx(old_val, value);
520 };
521
522 const BoundingBoxf3 bbox = m_bounding_box;
523 const float mean_size = float((bbox.size().x() + bbox.size().y() + bbox.size().z()) / 9.0) * (m_imperial_units ? f_mm_to_in : 1.f);
524
525 ImGuiWrapper::text(label);
526
527 ImGui::SameLine(m_label_width);
528 ImGui::PushItemWidth(m_control_width * 0.7f);
529
530 const bool is_value_changed = render_slider("##" + label, value_in, 1.f, mean_size, _L("Value"));
531
532 ImGui::SameLine();
533 ImGui::PushItemWidth(m_control_width * 0.45f);
534
535 const bool is_tolerance_changed = render_slider("##tolerance_" + label, tolerance_in, 0.f, 0.5f * mean_size, _L("Tolerance"));
536
537 return is_value_changed || is_tolerance_changed;
538}

const std::string UndefLabel
Definition GLGizmoCut.cpp:46

◆ set_center_pos()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::set_center_pos ( const Vec3d &  center_pos,
bool  update_tbb = false 
)
private
1212{
1213 BoundingBoxf3 tbb = m_transformed_bounding_box;
1214 if (update_tbb) {
1215 Vec3d normal = m_rotation_m.inverse() * Vec3d(m_plane_center - center_pos);
1216 tbb.translate(normal.z() * Vec3d::UnitZ());
1217 }
1218
1219 bool can_set_center_pos = false;
1220 {
1221 if (tbb.max.z() > -.5 && tbb.min.z() < .5)
1222 can_set_center_pos = true;
1223 else {
1224 const double old_dist = (m_bb_center - m_plane_center).norm();
1225 const double new_dist = (m_bb_center - center_pos).norm();
1226 // check if forcing is reasonable
1227 if (new_dist < old_dist)
1228 can_set_center_pos = true;
1229 }
1230 }
1231
1232 if (can_set_center_pos) {
1233 m_transformed_bounding_box = tbb;
1234 m_plane_center = center_pos;
1235 m_center_offset = m_plane_center - m_bb_center;
1236 }
1237}

◆ set_connectors_editing()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::set_connectors_editing ( bool  connectors_editing)

1862 if (m_connectors_editing == connectors_editing)
1863 return;
1864
1865 m_connectors_editing = connectors_editing;
1866 update_raycasters_for_picking();
1867
1868 m_c->object_clipper()->set_behavior(m_connectors_editing, m_connectors_editing, double(m_contour_width));
1869
1870 m_parent.request_extra_frame();
1871}

◆ transformed_bounding_box()

BoundingBoxf3 Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::transformed_bounding_box ( const Vec3d &  plane_center,
const Transform3d &  rotation_m = Transform3d::Identity() 
) const
1254{
1255 const Selection& selection = m_parent.get_selection();
1256
1257 const auto first_volume = selection.get_first_volume();
1258 Vec3d instance_offset = first_volume->get_instance_offset();
1259 instance_offset[Z] += first_volume->get_sla_shift_z();
1260
1261 const auto cut_matrix = Transform3d::Identity() * rotation_m.inverse() * translation_transform(instance_offset - plane_center);
1262
1263 const Selection::IndicesList& idxs = selection.get_volume_idxs();
1264 BoundingBoxf3 ret;
1265 for (unsigned int i : idxs) {
1266 const GLVolume* volume = selection.get_volume(i);
1267 // respect just to the solid parts for FFF and ignore pad and supports for SLA
1268 if (!volume->is_modifier && !volume->is_sla_pad() && !volume->is_sla_support()) {
1269
1270 const auto instance_matrix = volume->get_instance_transformation().get_matrix_no_offset();
1271 auto volume_trafo = instance_matrix * volume->get_volume_transformation().get_matrix();
1272 ret.merge(volume->transformed_convex_hull_bounding_box(cut_matrix * volume_trafo));
1273 }
1274 }
1275 return ret;
1276}

References Slic3r::GUI::Selection::get_first_volume(), Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::get_selection(), Slic3r::GUI::Selection::get_volume(), Slic3r::GUI::Selection::get_volume_idxs(), Eigen::Transform< double, 3, Eigen::Affine, Eigen::DontAlign >::Identity(), Eigen::Transform< _Scalar, _Dim, _Mode, _Options >::inverse(), Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase::m_parent, Slic3r::BoundingBox3Base< PointType >::merge(), Slic3r::Geometry::translation_transform(), and Z.

◆ unproject_on_cut_plane()

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::unproject_on_cut_plane ( const Vec2d &  mouse_pos,
Vec3d &  pos,
Vec3d &  pos_world,
bool  respect_disabled_contour = true 
)
2674{
2675 const float sla_shift = m_c->selection_info()->get_sla_shift();
2676
2677 const ModelObject* mo = m_c->selection_info()->model_object();
2678 const ModelInstance* mi = mo->instances[m_c->selection_info()->get_active_instance()];
2679 const Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
2680
2681 // Calculate intersection with the clipping plane.
2682 const ClippingPlane* cp = m_c->object_clipper()->get_clipping_plane(true);
2683 Vec3d point;
2684 Vec3d direction;
2685 Vec3d hit;
2686 MeshRaycaster::line_from_mouse_pos(mouse_position, Transform3d::Identity(), camera, point, direction);
2687 Vec3d normal = -cp->get_normal().cast<double>();
2688 double den = normal.dot(direction);
2689 if (den != 0.) {
2690 double t = (-cp->get_offset() - normal.dot(point))/den;
2691 hit = (point + t * direction);
2692 } else
2693 return false;
2694
2695 // Now check if the hit is not obscured by a selected part on this side of the plane.
2696 // FIXME: This would be better solved by remembering which contours are active. We will
2697 // probably need that anyway because there is not other way to find out which contours
2698 // to render. If you want to uncomment it, fix it first. It does not work yet.
2699 /*for (size_t id = 0; id < m_part_selection.parts.size(); ++id) {
2700 if (! m_part_selection.parts[id].selected) {
2701 Vec3f pos, normal;
2702 const ModelObject* model_object = m_part_selection.model_object;
2703 const Vec3d volume_offset = m_part_selection.model_object->volumes[id]->get_offset();
2704 Transform3d tr = model_object->instances[m_part_selection.instance_idx]->get_matrix() * model_object->volumes[id]->get_matrix();
2705 if (m_part_selection.parts[id].raycaster.unproject_on_mesh(mouse_position, tr, camera, pos, normal))
2706 return false;
2707 }
2708 }*/
2709
2710 {
2711 // Do not react to clicks outside a contour (or inside a contour that is ignored)
2712 int cont_id = m_c->object_clipper()->is_projection_inside_cut(hit);
2713 if (cont_id == -1)
2714 return false;
2715 if (m_part_selection.valid()) {
2716 const std::vector<size_t>& ign = *m_part_selection.get_ignored_contours_ptr();
2717 if (std::find(ign.begin(), ign.end(), cont_id) != ign.end())
2718 return false;
2719 }
2720 }
2721
2722
2723 // recalculate hit to object's local position
2724 Vec3d hit_d = hit;
2725 hit_d -= mi->get_offset();
2726 hit_d[Z] -= sla_shift;
2727
2728 // Return both the point and the facet normal.
2729 pos = hit_d;
2730 pos_world = hit;
2731
2732 return true;
2733}

◆ update_bb()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::update_bb ( )
private
1279{
1280 const BoundingBoxf3 box = bounding_box();
1281 if (!box.defined)
1282 return;
1283 if (!m_max_pos.isApprox(box.max) || !m_min_pos.isApprox(box.min)) {
1284
1285 m_bounding_box = box;
1286
1287 invalidate_cut_plane();
1288 reset_cut_by_contours();
1289
1290 m_max_pos = box.max;
1291 m_min_pos = box.min;
1292 m_bb_center = box.center();
1293 m_transformed_bounding_box = transformed_bounding_box(m_bb_center);
1294 if (box.contains(m_center_offset))
1295 set_center_pos(m_bb_center + m_center_offset);
1296 else
1297 set_center_pos(m_bb_center);
1298
1299 m_radius = box.radius();
1300 m_grabber_connection_len = 0.5 * m_radius;// std::min<double>(0.75 * m_radius, 35.0);
1301 m_grabber_radius = m_grabber_connection_len * 0.85;
1302
1303 m_snap_coarse_in_radius = m_grabber_radius / 3.0;
1304 m_snap_coarse_out_radius = m_snap_coarse_in_radius * 2.;
1305 m_snap_fine_in_radius = m_grabber_connection_len * 0.85;
1306 m_snap_fine_out_radius = m_grabber_connection_len * 1.15;
1307
1308 m_plane.reset();
1309 m_cone.reset();
1310 m_sphere.reset();
1311 m_grabber_connection.reset();
1312 m_circle.reset();
1313 m_scale.reset();
1314 m_snap_radii.reset();
1315 m_reference_radius.reset();
1316
1317 on_unregister_raycasters_for_picking();
1318
1319 clear_selection();
1320 if (CommonGizmosDataObjects::SelectionInfo* selection = m_c->selection_info();
1321 selection && selection->model_object())
1322 m_selected.resize(selection->model_object()->cut_connectors.size(), false);
1323 }
1324}

◆ update_clipper()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::update_clipper ( )
421{
422 // update cut_normal
423 Vec3d normal = m_rotation_m * Vec3d::UnitZ();
424 normal.normalize();
425 m_cut_normal = normal;
426
427 // calculate normal and offset for clipping plane
428 Vec3d beg = m_bb_center;
429 beg[Z] -= m_radius;
430 rotate_vec3d_around_plane_center(beg);
431
432 m_clp_normal = normal;
433 double offset = normal.dot(m_plane_center);
434 double dist = normal.dot(beg);
435
436 m_parent.set_color_clip_plane(normal, offset);
437
438 if (!is_looking_forward()) {
439 // recalculate normal and offset for clipping plane, if camera is looking downward to cut plane
440 normal = m_rotation_m * (-1. * Vec3d::UnitZ());
441 normal.normalize();
442
443 beg = m_bb_center;
444 beg[Z] += m_radius;
445 rotate_vec3d_around_plane_center(beg);
446
447 m_clp_normal = normal;
448 offset = normal.dot(m_plane_center);
449 dist = normal.dot(beg);
450 }
451
452 m_c->object_clipper()->set_range_and_pos(normal, offset, dist);
453
454 put_connectors_on_cut_plane(normal, offset);
455
456 if (m_raycasters.empty())
457 on_register_raycasters_for_picking();
458 else
459 update_raycasters_for_picking_transform();
460}
Slic3r::GUI::CommonGizmosDataObjects::ObjectClipper::set_range_and_pos
void set_range_and_pos(const Vec3d &cpl_normal, double cpl_offset, double pos)

◆ update_raycasters_for_picking_transform()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoCut3D::update_raycasters_for_picking_transform ( )
protected
950{
951 if (m_connectors_editing) {
952 CommonGizmosDataObjects::SelectionInfo* si = m_c->selection_info();
953 if (!si)
954 return;
955 const ModelObject* mo = si->model_object();
956 const CutConnectors& connectors = mo->cut_connectors;
957 if (connectors.empty())
958 return;
959 auto inst_id = m_c->selection_info()->get_active_instance();
960 if (inst_id < 0)
961 return;
962
963 const Vec3d& instance_offset = mo->instances[inst_id]->get_offset();
964 const double sla_shift = double(m_c->selection_info()->get_sla_shift());
965
966 const bool looking_forward = is_looking_forward();
967
968 for (size_t i = 0; i < connectors.size(); ++i) {
969 const CutConnector& connector = connectors[i];
970
971 float height = connector.height;
972 // recalculate connector position to world position
973 Vec3d pos = connector.pos + instance_offset;
974 if (connector.attribs.type == CutConnectorType::Dowel &&
975 connector.attribs.style == CutConnectorStyle::Prism) {
976 height = 0.05f;
977 if (!looking_forward)
978 pos += 0.05 * m_clp_normal;
979 }
980 pos[Z] += sla_shift;
981
982 const Transform3d scale_trafo = scale_transform(Vec3f(connector.radius, connector.radius, height).cast<double>());
983 m_raycasters[i]->set_transform(translation_transform(pos) * m_rotation_m * scale_trafo);
984 }
985 }
986 else if (!cut_line_processing()){
987 const Transform3d trafo = translation_transform(m_plane_center) * m_rotation_m;
988
989 const BoundingBoxf3 box = m_bounding_box;
990
991 const double size = get_half_size(get_grabber_mean_size(box));
992 Vec3d scale = Vec3d(0.75 * size, 0.75 * size, 1.8 * size);
993
994 int id = 0;
995
996 Vec3d offset = Vec3d(0.0, 1.25 * size, m_grabber_connection_len);
997 m_raycasters[id++]->set_transform(trafo * translation_transform(offset) * rotation_transform(-0.5 * PI * Vec3d::UnitX()) * scale_transform(scale));
998 offset = Vec3d(0.0, -1.25 * size, m_grabber_connection_len);
999 m_raycasters[id++]->set_transform(trafo * translation_transform(offset) * rotation_transform(0.5 * PI * Vec3d::UnitX()) * scale_transform(scale));
1000
1001 offset = Vec3d(1.25 * size, 0.0, m_grabber_connection_len);
1002 m_raycasters[id++]->set_transform(trafo * translation_transform(offset) * rotation_transform(0.5 * PI * Vec3d::UnitY()) * scale_transform(scale));
1003 offset = Vec3d(-1.25 * size, 0.0, m_grabber_connection_len);
1004 m_raycasters[id++]->set_transform(trafo * translation_transform(offset) * rotation_transform(-0.5 * PI * Vec3d::UnitY()) * scale_transform(scale));
1005
1006 offset = 1.25 * size * Vec3d::UnitZ();
1007 m_raycasters[id++]->set_transform(trafo * translation_transform(m_grabber_connection_len * Vec3d::UnitZ()) * scale_transform(size));
1008
1009 m_raycasters[id++]->set_transform(trafo);
1010 }
1011}

◆ use_grabbers()

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase::use_grabbers ( const wxMouseEvent &  mouse_event)
protectedinherited

function which Set up m_dragging and call functions on_start_dragging / on_dragging / on_stop_dragging

Parameters
mouse_eventKeep information about mouse click
Returns
same as on_mouse
229 {
230 bool is_dragging_finished = false;
231 if (mouse_event.Moving()) {
232 // it should not happen but for sure
233 assert(!m_dragging);
234 if (m_dragging) is_dragging_finished = true;
235 else return false;
236 }
237
238 if (mouse_event.LeftDown()) {
239 Selection &selection = m_parent.get_selection();
240 if (!selection.is_empty() && m_hover_id != -1 /* &&
241 (m_grabbers.empty() || m_hover_id < static_cast<int>(m_grabbers.size()))*/) {
242 selection.setup_cache();
243
244 m_dragging = true;
245 for (auto &grabber : m_grabbers) grabber.dragging = false;
246// if (!m_grabbers.empty() && m_hover_id < int(m_grabbers.size()))
247// m_grabbers[m_hover_id].dragging = true;
248
249 on_start_dragging();
250
251 // Let the plater know that the dragging started
252 m_parent.post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_MOUSE_DRAGGING_STARTED));
253 m_parent.set_as_dirty();
254 return true;
255 }
256 } else if (m_dragging) {
257 // when mouse cursor leave window than finish actual dragging operation
258 bool is_leaving = mouse_event.Leaving();
259 if (mouse_event.Dragging()) {
260 Point mouse_coord(mouse_event.GetX(), mouse_event.GetY());
261 auto ray = m_parent.mouse_ray(mouse_coord);
262 UpdateData data(ray, mouse_coord);
263
264 on_dragging(data);
265
266 wxGetApp().obj_manipul()->set_dirty();
267 m_parent.set_as_dirty();
268 return true;
269 }
270 else if (mouse_event.LeftUp() || is_leaving || is_dragging_finished) {
271 do_stop_dragging(is_leaving);
272 return true;
273 }
274 }
275 return false;
276}
